casebody.data:
Carl KRANZ, Appellant, v. William H. HIATT, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Lewisburg, Pa. No. 9415. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Submitted Oct. 6, 1947. Decided Oct. 7, 1947. Appellant pro se. Arthur A. Maguire, U. S. Atty., of Scranton, Pa., and Charles W. Kalp, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Lewisburg, Pa., for appel-lee.

Before BIGGS, ALBERT LEE STEPHENS, and MARIS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The order of the court below, 70 F.Supp.. 869, will be affirmed.
